BibleDatabase::TranslationNotFound

BibleDatabase::TranslationNotFound Class Reference

This class represents an exception that is thrown when a Translation object of the given name is not found in the TranslationManager. More...

#include <TranslationManager.h>

Detailed Description

This class represents an exception that is thrown when a Translation object of the given name is not found in the TranslationManager.
